name: interleague
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between members of different leagues (= groups of teams playing a sport who take part in competitions between each other): an interleague match between two teams from Chicago There are still another twelve interleague games to play this month.
More examplesFewer examplesBaseball instituted interleague play, with National League and American League teams to play against one another in regular-season contests.Supporters of interleague play believe that it will spark local rivalries.The league regularly played inter-league games against the West Coast Hockey League.
